content.raw:
very nice catch, this is actually a bug that is not related to joint limits, it's a low level memory out-of-bounds access error.


I will include an unit test for this error when I finally get around to actually fixing the joint limit jitter and submit a new pull request for it..


We should also look into back porting it to gazebo-6 and earlier version with the same bug.
content.html:
very nice catch, this is actually a bug that is not related to joint limits, it's a low level memory out-of-bounds access error.

I will include an unit test for this error when I finally get around to actually fixing the joint limit jitter and submit a new pull request for it..

We should also look into back porting it to gazebo-6 and earlier version with the same bug.
